input.text:
Q: Which film came out first, Blind Shaft or The Mask Of Fu Manchu?
A: Blind Shaft is a 2003 film. The Mask Of Fu Manchu is a 1932 film. So the answer is: The Mask Of Fu Manchu.
Q: What is the award that the director of film Wearing Velvet Slippers Under A Golden Umbrella won?
A: Wearing Velvet Slippers Under a Golden Umbrella is a film directed by Maung Wunna. Maung Wunna received the Myanmar Motion Picture Academy Awards. So the answer is: Myanmar Motion Picture Academy Awards.
Q: Are North Marion High School (Oregon) and Seoul High School both located in the same country?
A: North Marion High School (Oregon) is located in the United States. Seoul High School is located in North Korea. So the answer is: no.
Q: Who is the maternal grandfather of Antiochus X Eusebes?
A: The mother of Antiochus X Eusebes is Cleopatra IV. The father of Cleopatra IV is Ptolemy IX Lathyros. So the answer is: Ptolemy IX Lathyros.
Q: Why did Grand Duke Kirill Vladimirovich Of Russia's wife die?
A: The spouse of Grand Duke Kirill Vladimirovich Of Russia is Princess Victoria Melita of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha. The Princess Victoria Melita of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha died of stroke. So the answer is: stroke.
